TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaColumn extends System.Object implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 表示动态数据使用的数据库列。

span.span: Represents a database column that is used by Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序中， 类表示数据库字段。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database field. 利用类，您可以检索有关数据字段的信息，如类型和元数据信息。The class lets you retrieve information about the data field such as type and metadata information. 您可以使用属性检索数据字段所属的表 。You can retrieve the table that the data field belongs to by using the property. 您还可以通过使用属性来检索数据模型 。You can also retrieve the data model by using the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable table, class System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider columnProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (table As MetaTable, columnProvider As ColumnProvider)

span.span: The meta table that contains the column.
The column provider.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定某个列是否允许插入值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a column enables a value to be inserted.

value.span: 如果列允许插入值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the column enables a value to be inserted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`如果该列为只读并且列不是只读的，则默认值为 `true` 。The default value is `false` when the column is read-only and `true` when the column is not read-only. 使用特性可以重写默认值 。The default value can be overridden by using the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean
public: property bool ApplyFormatInEditMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当包含 对象表示的数据字段的数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时， 属性指定的格式设置字符串是否应用于字段值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the data field that is represented by the object is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果当包含 对象表示的数据字段的数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时， 属性指定的格式设置字符串应用于字段值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the data field that is represented by the object is in edit mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性验证是否将 特性应用于数据字段并检索属性的值 。The property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and retrieves the value of the property. 如果 找不到属性，则此属性将验证是否 应用了属性来检索格式设置信息。If a attribute is not found, this property verifies if a attribute is applied to retrieve formatting information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetMetadata() cil managed
abstract member ResetMetadata : unit -> unit override this.ResetMetadata : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除缓存的列元数据。

span.span: Clears cached column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列元数据是派生自属性并缓存以提高性能的信息。The column metadata is information that is derived from attributes and that is cached for performance. 调用此方法将清除此列的元数据缓存。Calling this method clears the metadata cache for this column. 下次请求任何派生自元数据的信息时，将重新生成元数据缓存。The metadata cache is rebuilt the next time any information that is derived from metadata is requested.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Scaffold { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Scaffold : bool with get, set
public virtual bool Scaffold { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Scaffold As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Scaffold { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应显示数据字段。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the data field should be displayed.

value.span: 如果应显示数据字段，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data field should be displayed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示在 ASP.NET 动态数据自动生成数据字段时是否应显示该字段。The property indicates whether a data field should be displayed when it is automatically generated by ASP.NET Dynamic Data. 此属性验证是否将 属性应用到数据字段，并返回属性的值 。This property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and returns the value of the property. 如果 特性未应用于数据字段，动态数据将使用以下规则来确定是否显示列：If a attribute is not applied to the data field, Dynamic Data uses the following rules to determine whether to display the column: - 如果将 属性应用到数据字段，则会显示数据字段。If a attribute is applied to the data field, the data field is displayed. 此规则将覆盖所有其他规则。This rule overrides all the other rules. - 如果属性的值 为，则 `true` 不显示数据字段。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed. 出现这种情况的原因是动态数据以不同的方式处理外键字段，并且通常不会显示外键字段值。This occurs because Dynamic Data handles foreign-key fields in a different way and will not typically display the foreign-key field value. - 如果属性的值 为，则 `true` 不显示数据字段。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed. 通常，在数据库中自动生成的字段不包含相关信息。Typically fields that are automatically generated in the database do not contain relevant information. 如果必须显示数据字段，请确保将该属性应用于数据字段。Make sure that you apply the attribute to the data field, if the data field must be displayed. - 如果属性的值 为，则 `true` 不显示数据字段。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed.

public: virtual property System::String ^ ShortDisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取列的短名称。

value.span: 列的短名称。

span.span: The short name for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 控件和其他控件提供了此属性，因为列标题空间有限，需要短名称。This property is provided for control and other controls where a short name is needed because of limited column-header space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性验证是否将 特性应用于数据字段并检索属性的值 。The property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and retrieves the value of the property. 如果 特性未应用于数据字段，则 属性返回空字符串。If a attribute is not applied to the data field, the property returns an empty string.
